message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $85. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $90.  Let's meet in the middle and make this happen!
